main_definition: The way something or someone looks or seems to others.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Physical look or outward appearance of a person, object, or place.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite her age, she still has the same youthful appearance.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The way something appears to be true when in fact it might not be.
meanings_and_examples.example: Appearances can often be deceiving; just because someone looks wealthy doesn't mean they are.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A performance or behavior that is intended to impress others.
meanings_and_examples.example: She put on a great appearance at the party, but it was all for show.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The impression made by something when first encountered; initial impact or effect.
meanings_and_examples.example: The new design of the building had an impressive appearance that attracted many visitors.
